    • Method Detail

      • parseJsonConfig

        public static java.lang.String parseJsonConfig(java.lang.String jsonConfig,
                               LimeAPIUtils.JsonFormat type)
        Function to parse a JSON config string received by the Lime API.
        Parameters:
        jsonConfig - The JSON string containing the config parameters passed to the api
        type - The type of JSON config received. Set by the api function that is calling the parse function
        Returns:
        null on failure, String to print on web page on success

      • validIPAddress

        public static boolean validIPAddress(java.lang.String ip)
        Utility function to check if a string represents a valid IP address
        Parameters:
        ip - The string to be validated
        Returns:
        True if the string represents a valid IP address, False otherwise
